                        java.util.ArrayList<ExitDoor> exitDoors)
        Internally changes the representation of the exit doors, in case the lever was activated.
        Parameters:
        lever - indicates whether the lever is activated or not
        exitDoors - the doors that are being updated

      • updateDoor

        Parameters:
        lever - indicates whether the lever is activated or not
        exitDoor - the door that is being updated

                   Entity entity,
                   char pos1,
                   char pos2)
        Updates two adjacent positions on this map
        Parameters:
        pos - the new entity's position
        entity - has the old position
        pos1 - the new representation for pos
        pos2 - the new representation for the old position
